study_metadata.name: Cloud_Model_Comparison_Experiment
study_metadata.description: Strategic comparison of optimized cloud models (GPT-4o Mini, Mistral Medium 3, Claude 3 Haiku, Gemini Flash) for narrative analysis across political speeches
study_metadata.hypothesis: Optimized cloud models provide superior quality and consistency for academic research, justifying their cost vs free local alternatives
study_metadata.research_context: Evaluate cloud model capabilities using same political speeches as local model experiment to enable direct cost/quality comparison
study_metadata.research_question: How do optimized cloud models (GPT-4o Mini, Mistral Medium 3, Claude 3 Haiku, Gemini Flash) compare in moral foundations analysis quality and cost-effectiveness for academic research?
hypotheses: Cloud models provide superior analytical consistency and depth compared to local models
GPT-4o Mini offers the best cost/quality ratio for academic research workflows
Different cloud providers show distinct analytical approaches suitable for different research contexts
Cloud model quality improvements justify API costs for critical academic research
success_criteria: Clear quality and cost comparison across 4 major cloud providers documented
Processing consistency and analytical depth measured across political content
Cost per quality point calculated for academic decision framework
Direct comparison data available vs local model experiment results
